title: Azure Patterns for Architects and Devs: Service Bus and CDN
body: There are so many Azure features and patterns out there, where should you start? Becoming familiar with Azure takes natural path of IaaS VMs, then Web Apps, then new patterns involving Service Bus and CDN. In this session, I will focus specifically on Azure Service Bus, Azure Relay, Azure CDN, and wrap up with an overall architecture showing them and more.
speaker: Tim Ferro
